== Vellattanjur (627740) ==

Vellattanjur is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 627 hectares and harbouring 1575 households with total population of 6704 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kunnamkulam]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 3234 and female population is 3470. Scheduled Caste Population is 801 and Scheduled Tribes population is 13. Census Location Code of the village is 627740<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
